context: Stunning video of block text. Awesome. I'm ecstatic I got to see that STUNNING VIDEO.
One dolphin was dancing, the rest were making comments and stuffing dollars in her garter. Now none of them can be a Supreme Court Justice.

Dolphins are the most amazing animals.  Playful, inquisitive!
They have approached us on the boat and have actually positioned their bodies sideways so you can look them eye to eye.  
Now I'm sure they're just doing that to see if we'd toss the some fish, but they are almost canine like in their behavior.
so um. Footage of the Dancing? Maybe include that part?
Worst. Video. Editing. Ever.
That would have been a good video... if they didn't ruin it by putting giant text all over the image.
So thanks for a video of water and words and no awesome dolphin dance...
Whoever put this video together --- how'bout next time letting us see the video instead of blocking it with comments?
Would have been an awesome story  (If the headline and the video matched up? Just thinking out loud here?).  Otherwise...really enjoyed it.  Great music.  Excellent font.
if anyone cares to read the comments first don't bother clicking on the video coz it's just more FOX clickbait. There are no dancing dolphins or anything that approaches it
Yup. Great video. Standing Ovation. When are the Webby Awards? Because you earned it. What a great piece of crap.
Unsupervised Fox interns are running this website
Dolphins gettin' their groove on. Woo Hoo!
CC video. No biggie,good the story. I never knew that a group of dolphins were called a pod. Interesting stuff.
How could I see them with all the narration covering them???
dolphins do this all the time.  it isn't news necessarily....but it is pretty cool seeing what these animals do.
The dolphins just found out about Hillary losing the election.
Look, stunning footage of text covering up a Dolphin pod.
Was there a video? All I saw were words.
Pretty cool.  It would have been nicer if the text was not blocking the screen.
Why post a link to a video that is NOTHING but some quotes and a few seconds of dolphins swimming.  Where is the dancing?  Talk about a crap link.

replies.context: He filmed them for 20 min. and this is what we get to see, FOX is really going down hill fast.

context: make a video that we can see pictures....not boxes!
ummm those are dolphns swimming not dancing...and out of focus...and blocked by text...and those were  porpoise
I would have loved to enjoy the video but you just had to ruin it with plastering your words all over the screen.  Who do you have doing this job, a kid who doesn't know better?
Worst video editing I've ever seen. Took a good video and ruined it.

replies.context: got it u can load text, where are the dolphins?

context: That was the lamest video EVER!!!!  Wow.  What a waste of time......well done.  Next time actually show what you are talking about, ok?
Too bad no one could see them with all the writing all over them.
Where are the other 19 minutes??????
Why have text block us from seeing the dolphins? Poorly done.
My dancing ant video didn't go viral no matter how big the text was that I put in front of it!
Now Hiring: Production Manager
click bait

Click bait!  Deceiving headline and video!  The captions covered most of the dolphins.  I hate the way news media runs their stiff anymore.  They either having extremely annoying, shouting news/weather casters with annoying voices, or, they cover half the screen with captions/titles and what have you.  It's one of the reasons why I rid myself of TV.  Everybody shouts and yells anymore.  Nobody just talks to each other!
Yeah.  Yeah.  The dolphin pod challenge is going viral.

This is the finest piece of editing I've ever seen.  The smooth flow, the barely noticeable cuts, the subtitle taking up 98% of the screen at the end with other subtitles only obstructing everything else...absolutely stunning.  I bet the editor had at least 22 minutes of editing experience in the industry before showing his/her prowess in this video.  (Danger: sarcasm present.  I think an embryo has more experience and talent than the editor here does.)

Well, you destroyed the video of the dolphins WITH YOUR CAPTIONS.
Forget about the video. It's useless.
What a waste! The captions completely obscured the video...Nice editing!
What the hell was that Fox?

replies.context: What ever it was it sucked.

context: So long, so long, so long and thanks for all the fish!
